duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead a team of engineers and technicians in running liquid rocket engine propulsion tests.
Design, construct, operate, and maintain propulsion test facilities.
Generate and execute detailed test procedures, and review and interpret test data for facility health and engine performance.
Specify and procure components and propellants, manage vendors and subcontractors, and plan and oversee facility schedule.
Support requirements development in conjunction with the propulsion design team to establish needs for test sequencing and new facility capability.
Contribute to configuration management, quality, cost, and process control, and advocate for safety of the test team and the test stand operations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering (Master's or PhD preferred)
U.S. citizenship or eligibility to obtain the required authorizations from the U.S Department of State
